0.1.name: wordpress/feastiebar
0.1.description:
The FeastieBar for food blogs allows your readers to take advantage of the features that Feastie offers directly from your food blog. Click on the red heart to bookmark the recipe. Click on the chef’s hat to log a recipe in your cooking history. Click on the notepad to add all of the ingredients from that recipe to your grocery list on Feastie. Click on the pear to be taken directly to your blog’s recipe gallery on Feastie, an easily searchable index of all of your recipes.

Before installing the FeastieBar on your food blog, make sure your blog has been indexed by Feastie. A list of blogs in the Feastie index is here: http://www.feastie.com/recipe-sources To add your blog to the Feastie index, fill out the form here: http://www.feastie.com/add-your-site
